rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with Art Deco motifs and a minimalistic approach. The entrance hall features a foyer that sets the tone for the rest of the design.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with Art Deco interior detailing. Large windows and decorative moldings enhance its elegance while ensuring ample natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, this dining space combines Art Deco elegance with modern functionality, featuring built-in seating and decorative elements.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office integrated within the ground floor for convenience. Thoughtfully designed with soundproofing and ample workspace.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design that incorporates traditional Art Deco elements. The layout is optimized for a family of four, with dedicated prep and cooking areas.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom adjoining the kitchen, designed to meet local building norms and ensuring adequate ventilation in compliance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and cross ventilation, adhering to Vastu principles with a south-facing orientation.
The main entrance door is positioned on the west side of the plot to align with Vastu principles regarding auspicious entry.
A south-facing window in the kitchen to balance the flow of natural light and ventilation.
North-facing window in the home office designed to enhance concentration and maintain a balanced atmosphere.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and Art Deco detailing. The room features a large window on the east side for early morning light.

rooms.name: Children Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom designed for two children, featuring playful yet elegant Art Deco accents and adequate natural lighting from east-facing windows.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom adjoining the master bedroom for privacy and convenience.

openings.description: East-facing window in the master bedroom to allow gentle morning sunlight and maintain a balanced environment as per Vastu.
A window on the east side of the children's bedroom providing natural light and maintaining Vastu harmony.
The master bedroom door is designed to face the interior corridor with a view towards the east, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: An extra bedroom for guests or as a study room. The design incorporates subtle Art Deco elements and Vastu-friendly orientation.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: A generous balcony that provides a private outdoor space with views over the landscape. The west-facing balcony is designed to balance the energy of the home.

rooms.name: Storage
rooms.description: A small storage area integrated into the second floor for additional household needs and to maintain a clutter-free living environment.

openings.description: A window on the west side to maintain a balanced exposure in accordance with Vastu principles.
A door that provides access from the second floor to the balcony, ensuring a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
